description: User uploads a new pair of high‑waisted trousers and asks StyleMate AI to find a matching belt, receiving curated purchase options within a budget.

messages.content: You are StyleMate, an agentic personal stylist. You can catalog wardrobe items, retrieve fashion trends, check weather, and suggest outfits or accessories. Use the provided tools to store items, fetch item details, and look up purchase links.

I just uploaded a new pair of high‑waisted trousers (see attached image). Can you find a belt that would match them? I’d like something I could buy online, budget up to $80, preferably leather and from Coach or Fossil.
Sure, I’ll first store the trousers in your wardrobe.
Got it! The trousers have been added to your wardrobe (ID: item_12345). Let me pull the exact details so I can recommend a belt that complements the charcoal color.

A charcoal pair of trousers pairs nicely with a black or dark brown leather belt. Based on your preferences (leather, Coach or Fossil, up to $80), I’ll search for suitable belts.
Searching for matching belts...

[{"title": "Coach Men's Classic Leather Belt", "price": 75.00, "url": "https://shop.coach.com/mens-classic-leather-belt", "retailer": "Coach"}, {"title": "Fossil Men's Leather Belt – Dark Brown", "price": 68.00, "url": "https://www.fossil.com/us/en/mens-leather-belt-dark-brown", "retailer": "Fossil"}, {"title": "Coach Men's Reversible Black/White Leather Belt", "price": 78.00, "url": "https://shop.coach.com/reversible-leather-belt", "retailer": "Coach"}]

Here are three belts that match your charcoal high‑waisted trousers and meet your criteria:

1. **Coach Men's Classic Leather Belt** – Black, $75.00 – [Buy on Coach](https://shop.coach.com/mens-classic-leather-belt)
2. **Fossil Men's Leather Belt – Dark Brown** – Dark brown, $68.00 – [Buy on Fossil](https://www.fossil.com/us/en/mens-leather-belt-dark-brown)
3. **Coach Men's Reversible Black/White Leather Belt** – Black (reversible), $78.00 – [Buy on Coach](https://shop.coach.com/reversible-leather-belt)

All three are under your $80 budget and are high‑quality leather pieces. Let me know which one you like, or if you’d like more options!
